name: At-Risk Customers
description: This segment identifies customers who are showing signs of disengagement and are at a higher risk of churning.
insights: These customers require proactive re-engagement strategies to prevent churn. Understanding the reasons for their inactivity is crucial for improving retention. Targeted incentives or personalized outreach could be effective.
query:
SELECT
  customer_id,
  date_of_last_purchase,
  total_number_of_orders,
  age,
  gender,
  location,
  total_spent_ltv
FROM
  `customer_data_retail.customers`
WHERE
  DATE_DIFF(CURRENT_DATE(), PARSE_DATE('%Y-%m-%d', SUBSTR(CAST(date_of_last_purchase AS STRING), 1, 10)), DAY) > 305
  AND total_number_of_orders <= 4;
